text: Caprese salad Tomato bredie prepared with chicken This is a list of tomato dishes. This list includes dishes in which the main ingredient or one of the essential ingredients is tomato. Dishes prepared with tomato sauces as a primary ingredient are not included in this list. ==Tomato dishes== * Bruschetta * Caprese salad * Fried green tomatoes * Galayet bandora * Gazpacho ** Porra antequerana * Paprykarz szczeciński * Pa amb tomàquet * Panzanella * Pappa al pomodoro * Pasta al pomodoro * Pico de gallo * Pizza pugliese * Salmorejo * Sarsiado * Stewed tomatoes * Stir-fried tomato and scrambled eggs * Stuffed tomatoes * Tomato and egg soup * Tomato bredie * Tomato chutney * Tomato compote * Tomato omelette * Italian tomato pie * Trenton tomato pie * Southern tomato pie * Tomato sandwich ** Cheese and tomato sandwich * Tomato soup File:Bruschetta.jpg|Bruschetta File:Fried green tomatoes.jpg|Fried green tomatoes File:Dicey gazpacho.jpg|Portuguese Gazpacho prepared with diced ingredients File:PappaPomodoro.png|Pappa al pomodoro File:Tomato bread catalan - stonesoup.jpg|Pa amb tomàquet with the squeezed tomato after its use File:Orecchiette al Pomodoro.jpg|Pasta al pomodoro File:Salmorejo cordouan.JPG|Salmorejo File:Fish Sarciado.jpg|Fish sarsiado File:TOMATOANDEGG GGSLDWT.jpg|Stir-fried tomato and scrambled eggs File:Pomidor dolması Azerbaijani cuisine.jpg|Stuffed tomatoes File:TomatoPie.jpg|Tomato pie File:Tomato and egg soup.jpg|Tomato and egg soup File:Fresh tomato sandwich.jpg|An open-faced tomato sandwich seasoned with salt and pepper atop the tomato File:Basil and Organic Tomato Soup.jpg|Tomato soup ==See also== * Canned tomato * Ketchup * List of fruit dishes * List of tomato cultivars * List of vegetable dishes * Sun-dried tomato * Tomato jam * Tomato paste * Tomato purée * Tomato sauce ==References== Tomato
